subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: A. J. Pierzynski tied the score with a pinch-hit, two-run homer in the eighth inning, then singled home the go-ahead run in the 10th to lead the Chicago White Sox to a 4-3 victory yesterday against the host Los Angeles Angels.
snippet: A. J. Pierzynski tied the score with a pinch-hit, two-run homer in the eighth inning, then singled home the go-ahead run in the 10th to lead the Chicago White Sox to a 4-3 victory yesterday against the host Los Angeles Angels.
